pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetic Algorithm and Particle Swarm Optimization // Implements genetic algorithm and particle swarm algorithm for real-valued functions. Various modifications (including hybridization and elitism) of these algorithms are provided. Implemented functions are based on ideas described in S. Katoch, S. Chauhan, V. Kumar (2020) doi:10.1007/s11042-020-10139-6 and M. Clerc (2012) https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-00764996.
